message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. We believe it would be an excellent addition to your business. Our initial offer for this exceptional product is $950000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering your preferences, we propose to sell the product for $900000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $850000, or at least closer to $860000?
We understand your position, Bob. In light of your proposal, we would like to offer the product to you for $880000. This is our final offer in this negotiation.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $840000?
Considering your latest proposal, we would like to offer the product to you for $865000. This is our best offer in this negotiation.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $830000?
After careful consideration, we are willing to offer the product to you for $845000. This is our final offer in this negotiation.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $825000?
